page.title: 18LINDSEY SCHOOL OF DANCING
page.content: The dancing school meets at St. George's Church in Heapham Road.The age group is two to twenty and about forty people go.It starts at 9.30 and finishes at twelve.We do ballet,which is a very delicate kind of dancing and tap dancing,which is quite exciting. You wear some shoes with metal on the heels and you tap your feet in different steps.Then there is Acro,which is handstands and somersaults and that is a bit funny when you learn new things.There also are modern and disco which are very similar to each other and in those you have to move quickly.For dancing you get medals if you pass your test.I go there because I really enjoy it.The dancing School opened in 1983.I started on the very first day.
